subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: John Degenkolb sprinted to victory on the fifth stage of the Giro d’Italia, after a crash near the finish, and Luca Paolini retained the overall leader’s pink jersey.
snippet: John Degenkolb sprinted to victory on the fifth stage of the Giro d’Italia, after a crash near the finish, and Luca Paolini retained the overall leader’s pink jersey.
